metadata.Title: CVE-2020-18900 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** A heap-based buffer overflow in the libexe_io_handle_read_coff_optional_header function of libyal libexe before 20181128. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in libyal/libexe issue 1 on GitHub.

notes.Note: sbeattie> libevtx contains an embedded copy of libexe

criterions.comment: libevtx package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
